game.name: Enter the Nemesis: Blood Portal
game.shortDescription: In this 2.5D hack and slash shooter platformer enemy bodies will become your platform. Kill enemies to activate the portals, and build a platform of bodies to reach the exits. Stomp the bodies, crack skulls, collect blood, and snatch their weapons. Find and free the girl, then defeat the nemesis
